system.description: You can channel the raw power of the Waaagh! through your weapons and even your own body, infusing them with psychic energy that tears at the very fabric of reality.
system.benefit: The character's Staff or any other Melee Weapon they are holding gains the Force Quality. If not holding a weapon, their Unarmed Melee Attacks gain the Force Quality.

prerequisites.text: Ork Weirdboy, Da Power of Waaagh!, WS 45, Willpower 35

specialAbilities.name: Force Quality
specialAbilities.description: Your staff, melee weapons, or unarmed attacks gain the Force Quality. Force weapons add your Psy Rating to damage and can be activated for devastating effects.
